backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, circles, rooms, posts, comments, connections, reflections, and challenges with access control and basic profile CRUD.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a change to the Home page welcome heading and listing related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI pages, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app setup handling authentication, profile loading, routing configuration, and conditional onboarding flow.
frontend/src/components/nav/AppShell.tsx: Layout component providing sidebar, bottom navigation, and user session/logout controls.
frontend/src/components/zen/AvatarPicker: Avatar selection grid allowing users to choose from a sprite sheet with visual selection state.
frontend/src/components/zen/GlassCard.ts: Reusable glass-style card wrapper supporting hover effects and custom classes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing the backend actor based on Internet Identity, including admin token initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient, including login state and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and circles via a backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind CSS styles, theme variables, dark mode tokens, and custom Zen UI effects.
frontend/src/lib/localCirclesStore.ts: Creates a persisted Zustand store for managing local demo circles, user-created circles, and membership actions.
frontend/src/lib/localRoomsStore.ts: Provides a persisted Zustand store for demo rooms and user-created rooms with retrieval and reset helpers.
frontend/src/lib/localWallStore.ts: Implements a persisted Zustand store for wall posts, comments, likes, pagination, and demo content.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ChatThread.tsx: Renders a chat thread UI with voiceâ€‘first messaging and typed message input for a given user.
frontend/src/pages/CircleDetail.tsx: Displays details of a specific circle including members, prompts, and metadata using local circle state.
frontend/src/pages/Circles.tsx: UI for managing growth circles, allowing users to create, join, and view circles with invite code copy support. Integrates local store actions and modal dialogs for creation and joining.
frontend/src/pages/Connections.tsx: Displays connection suggestions, incoming requests, and existing connections with actions to send, accept, or decline requests. Uses tabs and cards for structured browsing of users.
frontend/src/pages/Debate.tsx: Shows a weekly debate topic, lets users post responses, and lists community replies with likes. Includes input validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/Guidelines.tsx: Renders community guidelines and prohibited behaviors using stylized cards and icons. Provides static informational content for user conduct.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home dashboard showing user greeting, daily challenge, and quick navigation cards to major features. Pulls user profile and highlights weekly content.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Public landing page with hero section, branding, differentiators, and login button via Internet Identity. Introduces the platform's purpose and value proposition.
frontend/src/pages/MBTI.tsx: Implements an MBTI quiz with multiple questions, state tracking, and progression through the test.
frontend/src/pages/Moderation.tsx: Displays a static admin-only moderation page with restricted-access messaging.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding/Onboarding: Handles a multi-step onboarding flow collecting username, avatar, interests, goals, bio, and MBTI preferences, then saves the profile.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Shows the user's anonymous profile with avatar, bio, interests, goals, MBTI status, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/Progress.tsx: Renders a progress dashboard with stats, growth indicators, and recent reflections.
frontend/src/pages/RoomDetail.tsx: Displays details for a voice-only room including metadata, participants, and a push-to-talk interface.
frontend/src/pages/Rooms.tsx: Renders the Voice Rooms page with a room creation dialog and a grid of locally stored rooms navigable by ID.
frontend/src/pages/Wall.tsx: Implements an anonymous posting wall with categories, comments, likes, and load-more functionality using local store state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions to read, store, persist, and clear URL parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings for the Zenlink theme.
project_state.json: Describes the Zenlink project state, goals, architecture, features, and known build issues.
